definitions.definition: The conversion of something (especially metal ) into money .
The process of making a business activity profit-generating, particularly in computer and Internet-related activities.
The conversion of an economic system based mainly on barter and payment in kind into one that uses currency for most transactions .

main_definition: The conversion of something (especially metal ) into money .
secondary_definitions: The process of making a business activity profit-generating, particularly in computer and Internet-related activities.
The conversion of an economic system based mainly on barter and payment in kind into one that uses currency for most transactions .
